data.actual_result: The title doesn't show up until you switch apps, then come back to Discord, and the title is below the link
data.expected_result: When sharing a link with a title, the title should paste the first time, and before the link
data.short_description: Sharing links from apps that have a Title and a Link only pastes the link in Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Open an app that shares a link with a title (ex. Youtube, Reddit Sync, etc) - Share via Discord - Notice the text box doesn't have the title of the post or video, just the link - Switch apps, then back to Discord to find the title is now pasted below the link
